data.text: @RootsOfJudah @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump THAT’s true, but your previous comment isn’t. We can’t have a real dialog when 99% of what both sides say is extreme, inflammatory accusations. How are we ever going to be able to work together until both sides rein that in? There’s some pretty crazy shit being said either way.

@AnitaSummers57 @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Some say ," we don't support his bigotry and misogynistic rhetoric
But remain silent,,,, you are guilty too

@AnitaSummers57 @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Not extreme at all
If you knowingly support a man or woman who has shown to be a racist, by his or her words and actions ,,, you are a racist too
@DaShanneStokes @Wrath_of_Comm @realDonaldTrump Traitor Trump is a  straight up racist.  He say he's no racist, but his action speaks for itself
@herbj123 @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump She's probably the whitest senator on the Hill.  Are you guys really going to make the "one drop rule" the standard?  And I'm stupid?

@adbeattie33 @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Secondly, every time Trump or anyone else calls her or refers to her as "Pocahontas" is both bullying as well as discrimination. That needs to stop period.

@adbeattie33 @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump First of all, Senator Elizabeth Warren didn't get into Harvard as a student, she was hired to teach there. She formally notified officials at the University of Pennsylvania and then Harvard claiming Native American heritage *after* she was hired.
@DaShanneStokes @Gary_Coast @realDonaldTrump Because he thinks, (well really doesn't) thinks that nobody would notice. Kind of like, if it's out in the front of you, you don't notice it.
@DaShanneStokes @LenoreRaven @realDonaldTrump Actually i believe trump thinks all women are dogs, so i’m not sure he was using it as a racist slur.

@DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Let me clarify.. @realDonaldTrump is a racist.

@RootsOfJudah @DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Please stand down on the extreme stereotyping. Even though I thot Hillary was the better candidate, I didn’t agree with everything she said and did. Not *all* Trump followers agree with 100% of what he says and does either, no one group of people is that cookie cutter.

@DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump So essentially your saying that if the person in question is a dope or acting badly in your opinion right or wrong,  and they are of color, calling them out is racist. What kind of doctor are you?  This is the essence of dopey liberal victimhood

@DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump Let me get this straight. The left is permitting Elizabeth Warren, who has less native heritage than I do, to appropriate native culture so that they can call Trump racist for making fun of her for appropriating native culture to get into Harvard. It's getting hard to keep up.

@DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump They used Mexican, Peruvian and Columbian DNA to assess relatedness. Strictly speaking, @elizabethforma is at best a 6th generation Mexican, Peruvian or Columbian. At worst, 10th generation.  #FakeNews @realDonaldTrump

@DaShanneStokes @realDonaldTrump 1. not a slur, a name of an ACTUAL native (unlike her)
